name: Craftia (English)
description:
Prologue:

Some Quest scrolls came to my house, what's this. what's with Grandpa and what's with this Island.

The Forest was corrupted, Monsters came from the Coast, and Screams were heard from the Village and the Fortress.

It's dangerous, I have to deal with it!

(Indonesia Version is Available)

Game Content:

- 5 Great and Useful Main Characters.

- Collect Gold from Crafting, Farming, Fishing, Mining and more.

- Use Relic for Teleportation.

- Defeat Monsters to get the Loots.

- Collect various Gears to unlock the next Area.

- The mystery of Gear Island awaits you!

For the Third Game I made, I would like thanks to:

- Allah SWT.

- RPG Maker MZ.

- Devindo Gamejam 2.

- CGMZ Plugin.

- Caz Pixel Fantasy Tiles.

BGM From Youtube:

- Pix - Pixel BGM Playlists.
